meta.title: AcmeCorp — AI-Powered Workflow Automation
meta.description: Stop wasting time on manual processes. AcmeCorp automates your entire workflow so your team can focus on what matters most.

hero.headline: Automate Everything. Focus on What Matters.
hero.subheadline: AcmeCorp uses advanced AI to eliminate repetitive workflows, reduce errors by 90%, and give your team back 20+ hours per week.
hero.socialProof: Trusted by 2,000+ teams at companies like Stripe, Notion, and Linear

problemSection.headline: Manual work is killing your team's productivity

cards.title: Hours Lost to Repetition
cards.description: Your team spends 40% of their day on copy-paste tasks, status updates, and data entry that should be automated.

cards.title: Errors Compound Over Time
cards.description: Manual processes introduce mistakes that cascade through your systems, creating costly rework and customer issues.

cards.title: Teams Can't Scale
cards.description: Without automation, every new customer means new headcount. Your margins shrink as you grow.

valueProposition.headline: One platform to automate your entire operation
valueProposition.body:
AcmeCorp connects your existing tools — Slack, Notion, Salesforce, and 200+ others — and automates the workflows between them. No code required. Setup takes minutes, not months.

Our AI learns your team's patterns and proactively suggests new automations, so you get smarter over time without lifting a finger.

services.headline: Everything you need to automate at scale

cards.title: Workflow Automation
cards.description: Build complex multi-step automations with a visual drag-and-drop editor. Trigger on any event, filter by any condition, action on any tool.

cards.title: Real-Time Analytics
cards.description: Monitor every automation in real time. Spot bottlenecks, measure time saved, and prove ROI to leadership with beautiful dashboards.

cards.title: Enterprise Security
cards.description: SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, with SSO, audit logs, and role-based access control. Your data stays yours.

process.headline: Up and running in under an hour

steps.title: Connect Your Tools
steps.description: Link your existing apps in one click. We support 200+ integrations including Slack, Salesforce, Notion, and HubSpot.

steps.title: Map Your Workflows
steps.description: Use our visual editor to map out your processes, or let our AI analyze your team's patterns and suggest automations automatically.

steps.title: Test & Refine
steps.description: Run automations in sandbox mode to catch issues before they go live. Our step-through debugger makes it easy to pinpoint problems.

steps.title: Launch & Scale
steps.description: Activate automations with one click. Watch the time savings accumulate in real time on your analytics dashboard.

ctaSection.headline: Ready to get your time back?
ctaSection.subheadline: Join 2,000+ teams saving an average of 20 hours per week with AcmeCorp. Start free today.

cta.label: Start Free Trial — No Card Needed

items.question: How long does it take to set up?
items.answer: Most teams have their first automation running within 20 minutes. Our visual editor and pre-built templates mean you don't need any technical expertise. For enterprise deployments with custom integrations, our onboarding team will guide you through a setup that typically takes 1-2 weeks.

items.question: Do I need to know how to code?
items.answer: Not at all. AcmeCorp is designed for non-technical users. Our drag-and-drop editor lets you build complex automations without writing a single line of code. For advanced users, we also offer a JavaScript sandbox for custom logic.

items.question: Which tools and apps do you integrate with?
items.answer: We support 200+ integrations including Slack, Notion, Salesforce, HubSpot, Jira, GitHub, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Stripe, Shopify, and more. If we don't support your tool, our REST API and webhook support let you connect to virtually anything.

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: We are SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We offer SSO, audit logs, and role-based access control on our Business and Enterprise plans. We never sell or share your data with third parties.

items.question: What happens if an automation fails?
items.answer: AcmeCorp automatically retries failed automations with exponential backoff. You'll receive an immediate notification with a detailed error log. Our step-through debugger lets you see exactly where the failure occurred and re-run from that point after you fix the issue.

items.question: Can I try it for free?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features — no credit card required. After the trial, you can choose from our Starter, Business, or Enterprise plans. We also offer a free Starter tier with up to 1,000 automation runs per month.
